Invited Paper.<P> A. Apostolico, D. Breslauer, and Z. Galilm. Parallel Detection of all Palindromes in a String. Theoretical Computer Science, 141(1-2):163-174, 1995.<P> A. Apostolico and M. Crochemore. Fast Parallel Lyndon Factorization, With Applications. Mathematical Systems Theory, 27:89-108, 1995.<P> A. Apostolico, G. Italiano, G. Gambosi, and M. Talamo. The Set Union Problem with Unlimited Backtracking.
